data.title: Mathinst.uz
data.text:
Year of creation: November 3, 1943. After several transformations, the Institute of Mathematics of the Academy of Sciences of the Republic of Uzbekistan in its current status was established on February 17, 2017 on the basis of the Institute of Mathematics at the National University of Uzbekistan.

Director: Director: DSc, professor, academician Ayupov Shavkat Abdullaevich.

Employees: Employees: Researchers - 135, including: doctors of science - 55 (of which 7 are academicians), candidates of science and PhD - 52, without a degree - 28. In addition, doctoral students - 5, PhD students - 29, interns-researchers - 8, others employees â€“ 32. Today's laboratories and departments of the institute:

Scientific laboratory of algebra and its applications

Scientific laboratory of differential equations and their applications.

Scientific laboratory for stochastic analysis.

Scientific laboratory of dynamical systems and their applications.

Scientific laboratory of computational mathematics.

Scientific laboratory for mathematical modeling of nonlinear systems.

Scientific laboratory of biomedical informatics.

Laboratory for the coordination of teaching materials in the system of mathematical education.

Karakalpak branch

Bukhara branch

Namangan branch

Samarkand branch

Khorezm branch

The main areas of research of the Institute:

Algebra and functional analysis;

Differential equations and mathematical physics;

Theory of Probability and Mathematical Statistics;

Theory of dynamical systems;

Applied and computational mathematics.
